Body:
t = Template(
    """
        <%def name="outer_func()">
        OUTER BEGIN
            <%call expr="caller.inner_func()">
                INNER CALL
            </%call>
        OUTER END
        </%def>

        <%call expr="outer_func()">
            <%def name="inner_func()">
                INNER BEGIN
                ${caller.body()}
                INNER END
            </%def>
        </%call>

        """
    )
assert result_lines(t.render()) == ['OUTER BEGIN', 'INNER BEGIN',
    'INNER CALL', 'INNER END', 'OUTER END']
